item.title: The Indomitable Human Spirit
item.description: The Indomitable Human Spirit is a 3000 word story focusing on the human response to unending disaster Click here to read in PDF or continue below “Papa! What news?” Peter spoke as he looked up from spooning soup into the waiting mouth of Gramps, turning in his seat to catch the haunted eyes of his father, slouched in their hovel’s doorway. “The armies, they’ve finally met. Down at Bosun’s Creek.”

item.title: Company Culture
item.description: Conmpany Culture is a short, 3 people play that can be staged with just three chairs and a table (beyond this the limit is your imagination). The play’s subject matter focuses on the farce of modern coproate environments. Click here to read in PDF

item.title: Milquetoast Romance
item.description: Jill and Ryan formerly orbited similar social circles, but haven’t seen each other since those heady, pre-Covid days. Their chance meeting in a coffee shop may mark the start of a whirlwind romance, or perhaps something a little more grounded… Click here to read in PDF

item.title: Meade Conway
item.description: I’m a prose and stage writer based in London. You can find my writing on this website and judge my slender talents for yourself. I pay the bills as a software developer. Feel free to contact me through Twitter if you like anything you see here, or email me by combining my full name (meadeconway) with ‘writing@gmail.com’, all one word.
